Pharr.McAllen Heart Hospital:
The first freestanding heart hospital in the nation, McAllen Heart Hospital was designed specifically to provide an excellent and efficient setting for the diagnosis and treatment of cardiovascular disease. The hospital provides comprehensive inpatient and outpatient cardiac care, a 24-hour Emergency Center, General and Weight Loss Surgery programs.


== Services ==
A cardiac care hospital providing healthcare to the residents of McAllen, Texas and surrounding Texas communities in The Rio Grande Valley.
